title: Backward thinking riot OP

replies.body: Kha has been meta for a while, he could use a nerf

> Next thing you know its "Hmm, adc's ability scaling off ad ties them too much to bot lane, so we are gonna make all their abilities scale off magic instead" or "Hmm tanks are too tanky, lets make them utility supports that are squishy so they are not tied down to their role" 

That is a completely crippled leap of logic. He is getting a buff to allow some more versatility and will still be just fine as a jungler.

Remember when people (probably ones like you) cried endlessly because riot was only releasing champions that could fill one roll and lane?

Why is it so bad to give additional options? It wont hurt his jungling ability, at least any more than he deserves.

he cant lane as well as most other junglers. you got xin, rengar, jarvan, ekko, wukong. they can lane AND jungle just fine. when is the last time you ever saw a khazix in a lane? About as often as a champ is completely alone in their lane. also, most any champ being in a lane can squash khazix like the literal bug he is, sion just get tankier, riven just does riven things, yasuo blah, brand, xerath, ryze (LOL).
